ygData.messageBody:
In response to this :

> Sure... many mobs carry the blocks of ore... hey, and they only weigh
> 15lbs!! Heck, you can carry 3-4 of them if you have good Strength!! That
> will save LOTS of money... yeah, right... I would rather leave them
behind
> and carry a FS or Bronze sword that weighs less and is worth MUCH more...


I didn't say it would be easy, you do have to work to get what you want if
you really want to do it, it's part of the game, and you either accept it or
don't, choice is yours, Yes, the ores are heavey, 15weight is a lot to carry
around when you're not a typical ogre/troll/barbarian. But , with a little
ingenuity, one could think up possibly buying a few summoned bags off of a
shaman or doing the traveler's backback quest - both items which make
anything in them weightless. I have done the majority of all my
blacksmithing and pottery by fetching the materials from the mudites, and it
has been long tedious and at times down right irritating, but i've worked
hard for what i've made :)


Rebequa
16th Rogue
Cazic Thule
